p: The scanning electron microscopy (SEM) image and the corresponding elemental mapping profiles of BGT:0.6%Mn 4+ phosphors are displayed in Figure 3 . Obviously, the particle size of BGT:0.6%Mn 4+ powders ranged between 1 and 3 μm, as shown in Figure 3 a. The elemental mapping profiles shown in Figure 3 b–f suggest that the Ba, Gd, Ta, O, and Mn elements are uniformly distributed over the whole samples.
